product_name: Moving Comfort Switch It Up Reversible Capri Pants - Women's
long_description: With a reversible, 2-color design, the Moving Comfort Switch It Up Reversible Capri pants wick moisture away to keep you dry and comfortable during you next workout. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric helps you stay comfortable and features a UPF 50+ rating; side hems feature ruching. Chafe-free, flatlock seams. Wide Powermesh waistband slims and stays put. Internal pocket stashes small items. The Moving Comfort Switch It Up Reversible Capri pants for women offer a next-to-skin fit.
short_description: With a reversible, 2-color design, the Moving Comfort Switch It Up Reversible Capri pants wick moisture away to keep you dry and comfortable during you next workout.
